meanings.definition: A photographic process for making prints in ink of line drawings or other graphic matter.
meanings.sent1: I learned about autotype in my art class.
meanings.sent2: The autotype of the drawing came out perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The autotype machine decided to take a break and print smiley faces instead.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an autotype, printing memories in vivid detail.
meanings.sent5: The autotype process made the image stand out beautifully.

meanings.definition: A print made by this process.
meanings.sent1: The autotype was displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: I bought an autotype of my favorite painting.
meanings.sent3: The autotype print seemed to wink at me from the wall.
meanings.sent4: His smile was an autotype of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The autotype captured every detail of the original artwork.
